settings.title: Generic Questions
settings.answer_1: Oh dear ☹ If you wish to cancel your order, do get in touch with us immediately. As long as your order has not been dispatched, we can cancel it and refund your amount. If your order has been dispatched but yet to be delivered, you are eligible for exchange; however, the order cannot be cancelled.
settings.question_2: Q: “Can I place a bulk order?”
settings.answer_2: For bulk orders do get in touch with us at konnect@kosha.co or WhatsApp us at +919820999006.
settings.answer_3: Yes, we try our best to give you a great customer experience each time you shop with us. If you want to exchange it for a different size, color or style, you can buy any product in exchange against your previous order 15 days from the day the product reaches you. We will activate an exchange code for you once we receive the product from you in good condition with the product tag intact.
settings.question_4: Q: “What if I have received the wrong product?”
settings.answer_4: We’re so sorry! Our packaging procedures are thorough and usually accurate. However, we apologize if this has happened with your order. Please do call/e-mail with your order details. We will initiate the exchange procedure immediately.
settings.answer_5: In case a wrong product has been shipped to you, we are happy to refund your money if you don’t want the right one. For other cases, you are welcome to opt for an exchange within the 15 day period beginning from the time the product reaches you. Refunds will be processed only after the product has been shipped back to us.
settings.question_6: Q: “I want to Exchange one or more of the products I purchased. How do I go about doing this?”
settings.answer_6: Browse through the site and select the product you want in exchange. Then send us your previous product/s back. As soon as we receive it, we will generate a credit note that you can use to purchase another product.
settings.question_7: Q: “Who pays for the shipping if I exchange?”
settings.answer_7: For exchanges, the shipping cost will have to be borne by you.
settings.question_8: Q: “If I need to send the product back to you, where should I send it?”
settings.answer_8:
You can send it to this address. Please do notify us of the shipping number and service used on the day of dispatch so that we can track it from our side as well.

Kosha Travel Wear, Shop No - 4, Nav Meghdoot Building, 535, Linking Road, Opp. Regal Shoes, Next to McDonald's, Khar(W), Mumbai, Maharashtra-400052., Call : +91 9820999006
settings.question_9: Q: “The T&C says I can’t Exchange because I purchased the product during a sale. How do I go around this?”
settings.answer_9: We’re sorry. Items purchased during the sale cannot be exchanged.
settings.question_10: Q: “What if I want to change my delivery address?”
settings.answer_10: Please do contact us immediately. If not shipped yet, we will help you out. If already shipped, we cannot change the delivery address. Sorry ☹

settings.title: Order Related Questions
settings.question_1: Q: “How long will it take for my order to arrive?”
settings.answer_1: For detailed shipping timelines & details please view our Shipping & Returns Policy. Usually for domestic metro cities within 3 to 6 working days from the date of placing the order. In case the order is placed on a weekend or during public holidays, please do give us a couple of extra days.
settings.answer_2: We will ship your orders free of cost (except Cash on Delivery) within India. International orders above USD$500 are eligible for free shipping. International orders less than USD$500 will be charged USD$50.
settings.question_3: Q: “Can I exchange my product for a product of lesser value?”
settings.answer_3: Sure. You will receive a credit note bearing the difference of the amount, redeemable within three months from date of issue.
settings.question_4: Q: “Can I expect delivery on all days of the week?”
settings.answer_4: Why not! You can expect deliveries on all working days, during office hours.
settings.question_6: Q: “I am going out of town. Can you expedite my delivery?”
settings.answer_6:
Oh, how we understand your travel predicament. We will try our best to help you get your travel wear quickly to ensure a great trip.

Please do email us at konnect@kosha.co or call us immediately on +91 9820999006.

We recommend adding a note during checkout with your order.
settings.question_7: Q: “What if I have a specific request?”
settings.answer_7: Sure. We accept requests. In case you want us to send your order before, during, after a specific date with specific instructions or by a shipping company of your choice, do include a note while placing the order. Please let us know via WhatsApp as well highlighting the order number and request.
settings.question_8: Q: “How do I check the status of my order?”
settings.answer_8: We are just as eager for you to wear Kosha’s travel wear ☺ As soon as we personally pack and dispatch every order, an email with a tracking number will be sent to you. This will help trace your parcel’s journey.
settings.question_9: Q: “How will my order be delivered to me?”
settings.answer_9: We are super quality conscious and have tied up with the reputed courier companies only who will deliver your Kosha attire to your doorstep. Our Shipping partner is ShipRocket who look for the optimum way to reach your location. In case you’d like your order to be sent by a specific courier company, please do drop in a note.
settings.question_10: Q: “How will I know if the order is placed successfully?”
settings.answer_10: Once your order is successfully placed, you will receive a confirmation by e-mail. This mail will have all the details related to your order. Order details can also be viewed when you log in to your account on kosha.co.

settings.title: Damaged Delivery Questions
settings.question_1: Q: “I have received a damaged product, What should I do?”
settings.answer_1: Apologies :( Please call/e-mail us mentioning your order details immediately and ship it back to us. We will initiate the exchange procedure.
settings.question_2: Q: “Will I be charged for Exchange If I have received a damaged product?”
settings.answer_2: Absolutely not. It’s on us! Any other questions other than the above, feel free to call us/WhatsApp anytime between 11 am to 8 pm at +91 9820999006 IST. In case of any further assistance, we would be happy to help. Please feel free to contact us via WhatsApp on +91 98209 99006. We are available on this number 11 am to 8 pm Indian Standard Time. You can also reach us via email at konnect@kosha.co We look forward to your Kosha purchase. Wishing you good health ~ ♡ Team Kosha
settings.question_3: Q: “I am going out of town; I want to change the delivery date”
settings.answer_3: While placing your order please drop a note in checkout and WhatsaApp us with your order number about the date you want the products delivered. We will try our best to help you out. We cannot change the delivery date once the order has been shipped.

settings.faqs_text:
Below FAQ are some common concerns of our customer before shop at Kosha.
If you have other questions, please just send it to konnect@kosha.co.
settings.faqs_message_text:
If you have an issue or question that requires immediate assistance, you can click the button below to chat live with a Customer Service representative.

If we aren’t available, drop us an email and we will get back to you within 20-36 hours!
